mapper.select: select quesiboard, title, isanswer from question_board order by quesiboard desc
SELECT A.quesiboard, A.writeriuser, A.title, A.ctnt, A.hits, A.rdt, B.nm as writerNm FROM question_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.writeriuser = B.iuser WHERE A.quesiboard = ${quesiboard}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_board (writeriuser, title, ctnt) VALUES (${writeriuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt})
